title: SOLD (PENDING) Lot of (5) T206s with Polar Bears
author: Cozumeleno

posts.post_title: SOLD (PENDING) Lot of (5) T206s with Polar Bears
posts.post_content:
Five T206s here for SOLD/PENDING DLVD. via PPFF (or add 3% for regular PP).

Included are:

O'Leary Hands on Knees - Polar Bear
Oldring Batting - Polar Bear
McIntyre Brooklyn and Chicago - Piedmont 350-460 Factory 25
McCormick - Piedmont 350 Factory 25
Gasper - Sweet Caporal 350 Factory 30

These are all lower grade cards, but not abused. I just replaced these with rarer backs so they were in my original set which I had already been upgrading. All have some creasing although the Gasper is more like some 'wrinkling' at the bottom. Oldring also has a pin hole and O'Leary measures short.

No writing, significant paper loss, etc. McIntyre is NOT trimmed - diamond cut.

Please feel free to email with any questions regarding specific condition to any one of the cards.

Thanks for looking.

You should of included these in the initial deal 

:)
:) I gladly would have but just got their replacements in the mail today!
